Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Guangdong Jin Bao Lai Hotel in Guangzhou (Tangxia), you'll be close to Tianhe Park and Pazhou Complex. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Redtory Art and Design Factory and Guangdong Olympic Stadium.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 130 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Guangdong Jin Bao Lai Hotel.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, dry cleaning/laundry services, and multilingual staff.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Guangdong Jin Bao Lai Hotel.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 130 air-conditioned guestrooms. Complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access is available to keep you connected. Private bathrooms have rainfall showerheads and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include desks, as well as phones with free local calls.

With a stay at Guangdong Jin Bao Lai Hotel in Guangzhou (Tangxia), you'll be close to Tianhe Park and Pazhou Complex. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Redtory Art and Design Factory and Guangdong Olympic Stadium.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Tianhe Park - 1.4 km / 0.8 mi
Redtory Art and Design Factory - 1.9 km / 1.2 mi
Pazhou Complex - 3.1 km / 1.9 mi
Guangdong Olympic Stadium - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Guangzhou Carambola Park - 3.9 km / 2.4 mi
Guangzhou Library - 4.9 km / 3 mi
Guangdong Museum - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Tianhe Stadium - 5.5 km / 3.4 mi
Flower City Square - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
CITIC Plaza - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Canton Tower - 5.8 km / 3.6 mi
Guangzhou Opera House - 5.9 km / 3.6 mi
Lingnan College - 6.1 km / 3.8 mi
Whampoa Military Academy - 6.5 km / 4 mi
Taikoo Hui - 7.1 km / 4.4 mi

The preferred airport for Guangdong Jin Bao Lai Hotel is Guangzhou (CAN-Baiyun Intl.) - 30.9 km / 19.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
